name: CSS3 Cube
author: Fra Calo

sections.description:
The CSS3 Cube plugin is made for displaying feature content in front page; you’ll be able to build a css3 cube on front page and use the sides of the cube to preview the featured pages content.

The featured content is configurable through the customizer.

Usage

Once installed the plugin navigate to the customizer screen an have fun!!
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • added opacity setting on cube sides.
  • fixed CSS issues.

short_description: Integrates a cube-template for displaying page previews on front page in css3 cube fashion, configurable through the wp-customizer.
